titles.title: Prince Hall Freemasonry Stamp Act
Prince Hall Freemasonry Stamp Act
To provide for the issuance of a forever stamp to recognize the historical importance of Prince Hall Freemasonry, and for other purposes.
Prince Hall Freemasonry Stamp Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Prince Hall Freemasonry Stamp Act
This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to issue a forever stamp in recognition of the historical importance of the Prince Hall Freemasonry.
